channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling External Authentication Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling External Authentication Server

item.title: CVE-2022-22349|2024-08-03T03:14:54.901Z -- ibm -- sterling%20external%20authentication%20server
item.description: IBM Sterling External Authentication Server 3.4.3.2, 6.0.2.0, and 6.0.3.0 is vulnerable to path traversals, due to not properly validating RESTAPI configuration data. An authorized user could import invalid data which could be used for an attack. IBM X-Force ID: 220144.
